name: YAY - a dice game
description:
YAY - a dice game v1.0
Written by Devlin Wright aka Magicbane 
(initial release date: released 13 November 2020)

Contact me by Twitter if you like it - @magic_bane
If you like this software and would like to donate - leave a tip!
OR:
via Ko-Fi (https://ko-fi.com/magicbane)
via cash.app (£magicbane)

This was written over the course of two days as a small challenge to myself - around 12 hours or so in total. I didn't track the time that well.

The readme file contained in the archive contains a simple how-to-play, and an extended file explaining the rules (and are in part the notes I made to help me figure out scoring)
